Name: Neelanchal Farm
Highlights: Expansive coffee plantation featuring organically grown coffee beans, providing a unique opportunity for agro-tourism and sustainable farming practices.
Lush green landscapes with natural streams and waterfalls, offering a serene and picturesque environment that makes it a prime location for eco-friendly resorts and farm stays.
On-site processing unit for coffee beans, enabling farm-to-cup experiences for visitors and ensuring quality control throughout the production process.
Solar-powered irrigation system ensuring sustainable water management for the farm, reducing dependency on traditional power sources and enhancing environmental sustainability.

ValueParameters.description: The rise in coffee tourism in Coorg makes this farm an ideal investment, offering unique experiences for tourists seeking to engage in coffee cultivation and processing activities.
The Karnataka government provides subsidies and incentives for organic farming practices, enhancing the profitability and sustainability of properties like Neelanchal Farm.
Coorg's popularity as an eco-tourism destination is on the rise, increasing the demand for nature-friendly accommodations and farm experiences.
India's push towards renewable energy offers incentives for solar-powered agricultural operations, which aligns with Neelanchal Farm's sustainable practices.

Proposals.name: Green Agro Ventures
Proposals.description: Green Agro Ventures aims to expand the coffee plantation and introduce farm stay experiences for eco-tourism enthusiasts.

Proposals.name: Eco Resorts Pvt Ltd.
Proposals.description: Eco Resorts Pvt Ltd. proposes to develop eco-friendly cottages and promote sustainable tourism on the farm.
